Resource Center Introduction

The Resource Center is typically used for uploading files and task group management. For a stand-alone environment, you can select the local file directory as the upload folder (this operation does not require Hadoop or HDFS deployment). Of course, you can also choose to upload to Hadoop or MinIO cluster. In this case, you need to have Hadoop (2.6+) or MinIO and other related environments.
title: Resource Center Introduction
